misc

I keep a reading blog with my friend Kevin Sun. Two books I read recently that I highly recommend are Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind by Yuval Noah Harari and A Little Life by Hanya Yanagihara.

I occasionally write (short) stories and (longer) works of fiction. I was a participant in National Novel Writing Month (NaNoWriMo) for 3 years, from 2014 - 2016. You can find my most recent book here.

I also make stop-motion animations in my spare time, which you can watch on vimeo.
